inputs.remark:
visit重新整理：
V1 - Tinnitus/Hyperacusis clinic初诊：耳镜正常，纯音测听未做，发生癫痫
V2 - Audiology clinic：纯音测听完成，阈值正常
V3 - University Hospital FND clinic：多学科团队确认FND诊断，停药
V4 - Audiology clinic随访：讨论渐进脱敏计划，3个月内2次癫痫
V5 - 最终随访：6个月无癫痫，听力保护使用大幅减少

logic_summary: Inserted new V3 encounter for the University Hospital FND clinic visit (diagnosis and medication stop) as per remarks.
Shifted existing V3 to V4 and updated setting to 'Audiology Clinic (Follow-up)' to match remarks.
Added V5 encounter for the final follow-up outcome (6 months seizure-free, reduced protection).

history.present_illness: Referral to multidisciplinary team for assessment.
history.medical_psych_history: Diagnosis of Functional Neurological Disorder (FND) confirmed by team.

tests.name: Outcome Review
tests.key_findings: Seizure free for the prior 6 months. Use of hearing protection was now exceptional rather than routine.
